turns.content:
3. Art in Paradise - This museum features interactive 3D art exhibits that allow visitors to become a part of the artwork. Address: 199/9 Changklan Rd, Tambon Chang Khlan, Amphoe Mueang Chiang Mai, Chang Wat Chiang Mai 50100, Thailand. Rank in Google: 4.3. Opening Hours: 9:00 AM - 9:00 PM. Entry price for an adult: 400 THB, child: 200 THB.

Lunch: SP Chicken - Recommended dishes: Grilled Chicken, Fried Chicken, Tom Yum Noodle Soup. Address: 4-6 Soi Ratchamanka 6, Tambon Phra Sing, Amphoe Mueang Chiang Mai, Chang Wat Chiang Mai 50200, Thailand. Rank in Google: 4.4.

Dinner: The Riverside Bar & Restaurant - Recommended dishes: Pad Thai, Massaman Curry, Grilled Pork Ribs. Address: 9-11 Charoenrat Rd, Tambon Wat Ket, Amphoe Mueang Chiang Mai, Chang Wat Chiang Mai 50000, Thailand. Rank in Google: 4.3.

Foot Massage: Fah Lanna Spa - Rank in Google: 4.6. Opening Hours: 10:00 AM - 10:00 PM. Price for a foot massage: 300 THB.

Dessert: Bake & Bite - Recommended dish: Chocolate Lava Cake. Address: 56/2 Ratchamanka Rd, Tambon Phra Sing, Amphoe Mueang Chiang Mai, Chang Wat Chiang Mai 50200, Thailand. Rank in Google: 4.4.

Day 3:

1. Doi Inthanon National Park - This national park is home to Thailand's highest peak and offers hiking trails, waterfalls, and scenic views. Address: Ban Luang, Chom Thong District, Chiang Mai 50160, Thailand. Rank in Google: 4.6. Opening Hours: 6:00 AM - 6:00 PM. Entry price for an adult: 300 THB, child: 150 THB.
2. Baan Tawai Village - This village is known for its handicrafts and offers a variety of items such as wood carvings, textiles, and pottery. Address: 130/1 Moo 1, T. Tonpao, A. San Kamphaeng, Chiang Mai 50130, Thailand. Rank in Google: 4.3.
3. Mae Sa Elephant Camp - This camp offers elephant shows, elephant rides, and elephant feeding. Address: 119/9, Tambon Mae Sa, Amphoe Mae Rim, Chang Wat Chiang Mai 50180, Thailand. Rank in Google: 4.3. Opening Hours: 8:00 AM - 5:00 PM. Entry price for an adult: 2,400 THB, child: 1,200 THB.

Lunch: The Salad Concept - Recommended dishes: Caesar Salad, Tom Yum Soup, Pad Thai. Address: 14 Nimmana Haeminda Rd Lane 1, Tambon Su Thep, Amphoe Mueang Chiang Mai, Chang Wat Chiang Mai 50200, Thailand. Rank in Google: 4.5.

Dinner: The Good View Bar & Restaurant - Recommended dishes: BBQ Pork Ribs, Pad Thai, Tom Yum Kung. Address: 13 Charoenrat Rd, Tambon Wat Ket, Amphoe Mueang Chiang Mai, Chang Wat Chiang Mai 50000, Thailand. Rank in Google: 4.3.

Foot Massage: Fah

Lanna Spa - Rank in Google: 4.5. Opening Hours: 10:00 AM - 10:00 PM. Price for a foot massage: 300 THB.

Dessert: Iberry Garden - Recommended dish: Ice Cream. Address: 73 Moo 3, Nong Kwai, Hang Dong District, Chiang Mai 50230, Thailand. Rank in Google: 4.4.

Day 4:

1. Chiang Mai Night Safari - This is a night zoo that offers animal shows and tram rides to view animals in their natural habitat at night. Address: 33 Moo 12, Nong Kwai, Hang Dong District, Chiang Mai 50230, Thailand. Rank in Google: 4.3. Opening Hours: 11:00 AM - 10:00 PM. Entry price for an adult: 800 THB, child: 400 THB.
2. Wat Umong - This temple is known for its ancient tunnels and offers a peaceful atmosphere for visitors. Address: 135 Moo 10, Suthep, Muang Chiang Mai District, Chiang Mai 50200, Thailand. Rank in Google: 4.5. Opening Hours: 8:00 AM - 5:00 PM.
3. Bo Sang Handicraft Centre - This village is known for its umbrella and fan making and offers a variety of handicrafts. Address: San Kamphaeng District, Chiang Mai 50130, Thailand. Rank in Google: 4.3.

Lunch: Khao Soi Khun Yai - Recommended dishes: Khao Soi, Fried Rice, Papaya Salad. Address: 10/2 Singharat Rd Lane 3, Tambon Sripoom, Amphoe Mueang Chiang Mai, Chang Wat Chiang Mai 50200, Thailand. Rank in Google: 4.6.

Dinner: Ginger Farm Kitchen - Recommended dishes: Pad Thai, Green Curry, Spicy Basil Stir Fry. Address: 166, Moo 4, San Klang, San Kamphaeng District, Chiang Mai 50130, Thailand. Rank in Google: 4.4.

Foot Massage: Lila Thai Massage - Rank in Google: 4.5. Opening Hours: 9:00 AM - 11:00 PM. Price for a foot massage: 250 THB.

Dessert: Mango Tango - Recommended dish: Mango Sticky Rice. Address: 14/4 Rajvithi Road, Sriphum, Mueang Chiang Mai District, Chiang Mai 50200, Thailand. Rank in Google: 4.5.

This concludes the 4-day itinerary for a trip to Chiang Mai with children. This itinerary includes a variety of activities, shopping and dining options, and places to relax with a foot massage and dessert. We hope this itinerary helps you plan your trip to Chiang Mai!
